chemlib.jei.compound.acetic_acid.descrip: The acid that gives vinegar its flavor. It is useful not only in food, but as an antiseptic and a protic solvent.
chemlib.jei.compound.acetylene.descripti: This hydrocarbon gas burns intensely when mixed with oxygen, and has been used both for lighthouse lamps and welding torches.
chemlib.jei.compound.acetylsalicylic_aci: Also known as aspiring, this chemical is well known for its ability to reduce pain, fever, and inflammation.
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.aluminum_nitrate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.aluminum_oxide.desc: Also known as corundum, this mineral is a key component in many precious stones. Metallic impurites in corundum can create vibrant colors, becoming ruby or sapphire.
chemlib.jei.compound.amide.description: 酰胺 groups are common in organic compounds, found in proteins, plastics, and medication.
chemlib.jei.compound.ammonia.description: A noxious gas commonly found in aquatic waste, this chemical can improve fertilizers and is used as a cleaning agent.
chemlib.jei.compound.ammonium.descriptio: An acidic, gaseous form of ammonia, salts of ammonium are useful in promoting plant growth.
chemlib.jei.compound.ammonium_chloride.d: Called sal ammoniac, this mineral can be found naturally and as residue from burning coal dumps. Used to flavor licorice, and in cough medicine.
chemlib.jei.compound.antimony_trioxide.d: This mineral is commonly used not only as a pigment, but as flame retardant in many materials, such textiles and electronics.
chemlib.jei.compound.antimony_trisulfide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.arsenic_sulfide.des: Called "ruby of arsenic", this chemical forms brilliant red crystals, and can be used both for explosives and as a pesticide.
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_carbonate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_chloride.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_hydroxide.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_oxide.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_sulfate.desc: The mineral barite is the most common source of barium, and can be used as a pigment, drilling fluid, and as a contrast agent of X-ray imaging.
chemlib.jei.compound.barium_sulfide.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beryl.description: A hexagonal, crystalline mineral, beryl can form many kinds of precious stones, such as emerald and aquamarine.
chemlib.jei.compound.beryllium_carbonate: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beryllium_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beryllium_nitrate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beryllium_oxide.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beryllium_sulfate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.beta_carotene.descr: A strongly coloured organic pigment, common in fungi, plants, and fruits. A fantastic source of vitamin A.
chemlib.jei.compound.butane.description: 丁烷 and propane were discovered simultaneously, as gasses found dissolved in crude petroluem.
chemlib.jei.compound.cadmium_carbonate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cadmium_hydroxide.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cadmium_nitrate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cadmium_sulfate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cadmium_sulfide.des: In addition to its use as a pigment, this chemical can be used in thin films to make solar cells.
chemlib.jei.compound.caffeine.descriptio: The world's most popular psychoactive drug. Can be extracted from coffee and cacao beans.
chemlib.jei.compound.calcium_carbonate.d: A major component in limestone, this compound is also found in shellfish, pearls, and eggshells. It's also often sold as antacid tablets.
chemlib.jei.compound.calcium_hydroxide.d: Also called slaked lime, this chemical is useful in the preparation of mortar, as well as in sewage treatment.
chemlib.jei.compound.calcium_nitrate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.calcium_oxide.descr: Also called quicklime, this chemical is commonly used in industrial processes, though the Romans used choking clouds of it as a weapon.
chemlib.jei.compound.calcium_sulfate.des: Also called gypsum, this compound is biocompatible and can be used in bone grafts.
chemlib.jei.compound.carbon_dioxide.desc: An acidic, trace gas found in the atmosphere, and a common bi-product of combustion, and a major greenhouse gas. Also useful as a refrigerant and supercritical solvent.
chemlib.jei.compound.carbon_disulfide.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.carbon_monoxide.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.carbonate.descripti: An anion of carbonic acid can be combined with metals to form carbonate salts of many varieties. It's the simplest oxocarbon anion.
chemlib.jei.compound.cellulose.descripti: An important structural component of green plants, cellulose is the most abundant organic polymer on Earth. It is used to make paper, and can be chemically treated to make cellophane plastics.
chemlib.jei.compound.cesium_carbonate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cesium_chloride.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cesium_hydroxide.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cesium_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cesium_sulfate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.chitin.description: An organic polymer, the primary component of the cells of fungi, and the exoskeletons of arthropods. Structurally similar to cellulose, but functionally a protein.
chemlib.jei.compound.chromium_oxide.desc: Called eskolaite or viridian, this pigment's fine powder is also useful for polishing the edges of knives.
chemlib.jei.compound.cobalt_aluminate.de: Also called 钴 Blue, this compound is commonly used in dying ceramics and glass.
chemlib.jei.compound.cobalt_carbonate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cobalt_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cobalt_sulfate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_carbonate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_chloride.des: Forming the rare mineral tolbachite, this chemical can be used in pyrotechnics to give the flame a blue-green color.
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_i_oxide.desc: This chemical is most commonly used as a marine fungicide, but shows promise as a potential solar cell coating.
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_i_sulfide.de: Found in nature as chalcocite, this mineral can easily be converted to pure copper by heating in an oxygen-rich environment.
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_ii_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_ii_sulfate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.copper_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.cucurbitacin.descri: A natural bitterant found in squash plants. Eating too much can cause poisoning, called "Toxic Squash Syndrome"
chemlib.jei.compound.diammonium_phosphat: DAP for short, this chemical is a common plant food, and can be used as a fire retardant.
chemlib.jei.compound.epinephrine.descrip: A hormone most useful in its ability to treat allergic reaction anaphylaxis.
chemlib.jei.compound.ethane.description: After methane, the second-largest component of natural gas.
chemlib.jei.compound.ethanol.description: Ethyl alcohol or grain alcohol, this liquid can be made via fermentation, and is flammable at high concentration.
chemlib.jei.compound.ethylene.descriptio: This chemical is widely used in industrial chemistry, particularly in the synthesis of polyethylene plastics.
chemlib.jei.compound.han_purple.descript: A tradition Chinese pigment, it's possible the recipe for making this compound came from improvements to the earlier Egyptian Blue.
chemlib.jei.compound.hexane.description: A non-polar solvent, hexanes are commonly used in the production of leather and glue.
chemlib.jei.compound.hydrochloric_acid.d: Known to alchemist as acidum salis or muriatic acid, when combined with 硝酸 it is known as aqua regia; an acid capable of dissolving gold.
chemlib.jei.compound.hydrogen_sulfide.de: This poisonous, corrosive gas is known to miners as "stinkdamp", as it is heavier than air and can pool underground.
chemlib.jei.compound.hydroxide.descripti: A diatomic anion, hydroxide occurs as a natural constituent of water
chemlib.jei.compound.hydroxylapatite.des: Hydroxylapatite is the primary mineral in human bones. It can also be found in calcified organs, sometimes called "Brain sand".
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_carbonate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_disulfide.desc: Called pyrite or fool's gold, this mineral forms cubic crystals with a golden lustre. The name 'pyrite' comes from the fact that it produces sparks when struck against steel.
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_ii_oxide.descr: Known as wüstite, this black oxide makes up 8% of the earth's crust, and is often used in tattoos.
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_ii_sulfate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_iii_nitrate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.iron_oxide.descript: Also known as hematite, iron(III) oxide is a common ore used in the making of steel. It can also be used as a polishing abrasive, or as a pigment.
chemlib.jei.compound.kaolinite.descripti: Rocks made from kaolinite are known as kaolin clay. It's a popular material for use in ceramics. It's also sometimes eaten as a snack, or as a health food, though it has little to no dietary benefit.
chemlib.jei.compound.keratin.description: A fibrous protein, this compound makes up hair, nails, feathers, horns, scales, claws, hooves, and skin.
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_carbonate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_iodide.descrip: A tradition lead pigment, rarely used in modern times due to toxicity.
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_nitrate.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_oxide.descript: Called litharge or massicot, this compound is used extensively in lead glass.
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_sulfate.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lead_sulfide.descri: Found in the ore galena, a common natural source of lead. It's thought the lead sulfide snows on the mountains of Venus.
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_carbonate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_chloride.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_hydroxide.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_nitrate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_oxide.descr: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.lithium_sulfate.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.magnesium_carbonate: This compounds hygroscopic properties make it an import part of major table salt brands - as an additive, it stops salt clumping in wet weather.
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.magnesium_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.magnesium_nitrate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.magnesium_oxide.des: Also known as periclase, this mineral is highly resistant to heat and pressure. It's a common component in contact metamorphic rocks.
chemlib.jei.compound.magnesium_sulfate.d: Also know as epsom salt or bath salt, it's one of the primary salts in seawater, and the main reason sound doesn't travel well through the ocean.
chemlib.jei.compound.manganese_carbonate: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.manganese_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.manganese_nitrate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.manganese_oxide.des: Also called pyrolusite, this compound is a major component in dry-cell batteries.
chemlib.jei.compound.manganese_sulfate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.mercury_sulfide.des: Called vermillion or cinnabar, this red compound has been used as pigment since ancient Greece.
chemlib.jei.compound.methane.description: The primary component of natural gas, methane can be found naturally in swamp gasses.
chemlib.jei.compound.mullite.description: With a high melting point and strong crystal structure, mullite makes strong porcelain.
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_carbonate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_chloride.des: This chemical can turn a wide variety of colors when the salt forms complexes with other substances, but green is the most common.
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_oxide.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_sulfate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nickel_sulfide.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nitrate.description: A polyatomic anion, salts formed from nitrate are called 'nitrates'. Nitrates are largely water-soluble, and are common components in fertilizers and explosives.
chemlib.jei.compound.nitric_acid.descrip: This chemical is a strong oxidizer, making it invaluable for use in rocket fuel and dynamite.
chemlib.jei.compound.nitric_oxide.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.nitrogen_dioxide.de: This noxious gas is a poisonous by-product of burning fossil fuels, and gives nuclear mushroom clouds their signature red-brown tint.
chemlib.jei.compound.pentane.description: A popular solvent, pentane's low boiling point also make it ideal for geothermal energy production.
chemlib.jei.compound.phosphate.descripti: An anion of phosphoric acid, phosphates play a key role in biochemistry - they add hardness to bones and teeth, and are vital to the growth of some plants.
chemlib.jei.compound.phosphoric_acid.des: Though it's used in toothpaste as a cleaning agent and foods to make them more tart, you shouldn't eat too much of this acid, as it can cause kidney stones.
PVC is a rigid polymer, strong but brittle. Among other uses, it's often pressed into vinyl records.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_carbonate: A primary component of potash, this salt is often used in the production of glass, soap, and as a leavening agent.
A metal halide salt, potassium chloride is also known as sylvite, and can be used as an food additive as a low-sodium salt substitute.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_cyanide.d: This crystalline salt is useful in the mining of gold - processing ore in a salt solution can remove the gold chemically, extracting more metal than can be done conventionally.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_dichromat: While this chemical can be used as a richly-colored wood stain, chromium is a common allergen, causing skin irritation.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_ethyl_xan: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_nitrate.d: Also known as niter or saltpeter, this chemical is commonly used to synthesize fertilizers and gunpowder. It can also be used as a salt to cure meats.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_oxide.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_permangan: Traditionally used as a disinfectant, this chemical can be used on both wounds and to purify water, though it tends to turn the water pink.
chemlib.jei.compound.potassium_sulfate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.propane.description: While a gas at standard pressure, propane can be compressed into a liquid, making for easy transportation.
chemlib.jei.compound.protein.description: Proteins are large, complicated molecules made from chains of amino acids, that make up all living things. This protein is one of the most simple, known as cysteine.
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.rubidium_chloride.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.rubidium_nitrate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.rubidium_oxide.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.rubidium_sulfate.de: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.silicon_dioxide.des: Also known as silica, this abundant mineral is a major constituent of sand, and is a key component in almost every mineral. Crystalline forms include clear quartz and opal.
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_bisulfate.de: This acid salt is commonly used in cleaning products, and can also be found in some cake mixes.
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_carbonate.de: Called soda ash, this chemical is traditionally extract from the ashes of plants. Useful both for cleaning and as a more-alkaline alternative to baking soda.
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_chloride.des: Common table salt, sodium chloride is the salt most responsible for the salinity of seawater. It has numerous uses in manufacturing and electrolysis.
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_hydroxide.de: Also called caustic soda, it can decompose proteins causing severe chemical burns. It's also use as an esterification in the production of soap.
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_nitrate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_oxide.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.sodium_sulfate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.starch.description: Starch is the most common carbohydrate in the human diet. It is also used to make bioplastics.
chemlib.jei.compound.strontium_carbonate: The mineral Strontianite, when combined with other metals, helps with conductivity, and is electroluminescent.
这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.strontium_hydroxide: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.strontium_nitrate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.strontium_oxide.des: CRTs are required to use strontium oxide as a screen coating, in order to block the emission of X-ray radiation.
chemlib.jei.compound.strontium_sulfate.d: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.sucrose.description: Simple white sugar or table sugar, sucrose is usually extracted from sugar cane or sugar beets. It's a common food additive, but can be particularly bad for your teeth.
chemlib.jei.compound.sulfur_dioxide.desc: A product of burning sulfur - smells like matches. Usually a pollutant, but historically has been used to preserve wines.
chemlib.jei.compound.sulfur_trioxide.des: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.sulfuric_acid.descr: Known to alchemists as oil of vitriol, this chemical has a wide variety of industrial uses, though its primary household use is drain cleaner.
chemlib.jei.compound.tin_oxide.descripti: Called cassiterite, this compound is a useful tool in gas detection, as it changes electrical resistance when exposed to flammable gasses.
chemlib.jei.compound.tin_sulfate.descrip: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.titanium_oxide.desc: A black semiconductor, this mineral can be found extremely rarely in nature as tistarite.
chemlib.jei.compound.triglyceride.descri: An esther of three fatty acids, triglycerides are the main component of animal fats and plant oils.
chemlib.jei.compound.urea.description: Also known as carbamide, urea is a common product of nitrogen metabolism.
chemlib.jei.compound.water.description: Also known as dihydrogen monoxide, and a vital component for all organic life. Not only is it vital for life and farming, but most long-distance trade goods are transported over water.
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_carbonate.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_hydroxide.desc: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_nitrate.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_oxide.descript: A wide-band gap semiconductor, this mineral is useful for making transparent electronics.
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_sulfate.descri: 这种化学物质的用途目前还不清楚。
chemlib.jei.compound.zinc_sulfide.descri: Known as sphalerite, this compound becomes phosphorescent win mixed with a suitable activator. Traditionally used in CRTs, x-ray machines, and glow-in-the-dark toys.
chemlib.jei.element.description: 使用元素周期表来了解更多关于这种元素的信息。
item.chemlib.periodic_table.tooltip: 用这个可以看到一个完整的元素周期表。
